verbs.description: China [V: could] choose to run a dirty campaign against highly visible products like Starbucks coffee and Apple iPhones in retaliation for Trump 's tariffs .
[ARG0: China] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: choose] [ARG1: to run a dirty campaign against highly visible products like Starbucks coffee and Apple iPhones in retaliation for Trump 's tariffs] .
[ARG0: China] could choose to [V: run] [ARG1: a dirty campaign] [ARG3: against highly visible products like Starbucks coffee and Apple iPhones] [ARGM-PRP: in retaliation for Trump 's tariffs] .
